pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD® RyzenTM 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 780 (3GB) or AMD® Radeon™ HD 7870 (2GB)
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p (30FPS)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit or Windows® 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-10600K or AMD® RyzenTM 5 5600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ RTX 2060 Super (6GB) or AMD® Radeon™ RX 5700 XT (8GB)
  • Storage: >20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p (60FPS)
